assignName(address,string).details: Note the validation of the name should happen in the library contract.      Only the owner of this contract can call this.

params.addr: Address to set the name for.
params.name: Name to add a name record for.

params.addr: Address to find the min limit for.

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

params.name: Name to resolve to an address.

setMinLimit(address,uint8).details: Validation should happen in the library contract.      Only the owner of this contract can call this.

params.addr: Address to set the limit on.
params.limit: Minimum length of any future added name records.

setMinLimit(address,uint8).return: True if setting the limit succeeds.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
